attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call for immediate legislation to remove carers from the main stream benefit system,out of poverty,out of dwp imprisoned low earning level restriction (100pw).cease overlapping rule.Get to grip with the enslaved volume of input with blanket C.A.when the disabled persons care is in one of 3 groups.We are major key workers providing a service of care which deserves to be rewarded with minimal standard of living,dignity,human right to a life aside from care role.

To provide all same rights as an employed paid carer, not to be penalized and exploited due to relationship of the person cared for,re-imburse  carer financial losses,insist social care support is active from start to support this.End discrimination with regard housing and ageism.

Urgently take carers out of poverty and soup kitchens.Work market age carers priority.
